name: Vodka
select: Vodka is defined as a neutral-flavoured, clear spirit. That basically means that vodka is supposed to be virtually tasteless, odorless, and clear (like water) in color.

name: Gin
select: Gin is a clear spirit and it mixes well with other ingredients. But what makes gin different is that itâ€™s flavored with various botanicals to give gin its distinct taste.
